title: Cartesian Genesis
description: A beautiful medical researcher, a man from another era, a world that's changed so much -- yet so little. Cryonics patient Dave Paxton pursues life, love, and happiness 155 years after his birth in this unusual tale set in 22nd-century Middle America. Here is story of reawakening and our universal quest to belong, cast in a society remade by the information revolution.
author: Richard Kahlshier
